title.narrative: Creating Access to education for Children with Disabilities

description.narrative: In Ethiopia Children with disabilities (CwDs) are stigmatized and discriminated, it is estimated that 3 % of them have an access to education. This project contributes towards reduction of inequalities through Community Based Rehabilitation (CBR) in Bishof tu Town of Oromia state. The project can be considered as a scale-up of the previous project giving emphasis on CwDs found in 3 new districts where no intervention has been made. The project works towards improving access to inclusive education through bui lding the capacities of local schools and initiating alternative access to basic education and vocational training programs. Implementing partner is Handicap National (HN) which is an experienced Ethiopian NGO focusing on people with disabilities working w ith the method of CBR.The direct beneficiaries are 275 disabled children and young people and 200 parents of CwDs especially mothers. Also schools teachers government offices officials and community structures are important stakeholders and expected to be nefit from the project.Immediate objectives are: 1. The situation special needs and potentials of CwDs are understood respected + fulfilled and fully integrated in their community 2. Children and youths with disability are provided with equal opportunity to an accessible education program in Bishoftu Town 3. To enhance the capacities of local government CSOs and community based structures and support policies pertinent to CwD's in the area.The project will employ CBR strategy that supports children with va rious forms of disabilities to integrate to their community and empower them based on their special need and potential. The main activities of the project are: 1. securing access to education 2. Rehabilitation services of the CwDs, including medical psych osocial and life skill suppor 3. awareness raising and capacity building of the community and government officials4. Income generating activities of the parents Education for All approach and income generating activities which are taken part mostly by wome n promote gender equality. The project emphasizes women due to the fact that the issues of CwDs are highly affecting the lives of mothers in households. Climate sustainability is also taken into account as environmental degradation directly relates to the situation and impoverishment of the marginalized. Therefore climate sustainability is supported by child club awareness raising campaigns.
